official_title: Expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".

summary.text: Supports National Whole Child Month. Recognizes that ensuring that all children are healthy, safe, engaged, supported, and challenged is a national priority. Encourages parents, educators, and community members to support and provide a whole child approach to education for each student.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".
